author: Brian Gormley
title: Race for a Cure Spurs Biotechs to Rely More on Nonprofit Backers
text:
As biotech startups race to find a cure for rare and other diseases, they’re looking beyond venture capitalists for a leg up.
Increasingly they turn to philanthropists, private foundations and other nonprofits—not only for capital and expertise, but also for a crucial link to patients facing down these diseases.
Although such groups invest...
